comment: New phone loaded latest version. Belgium only now.

reply.author: myShopi
reply.content: Hello, the application is always available in all country if you are not in the belgian store. Search "myShopi" on the Google Play Store and you can download the application again. Have a great day, the myShopi team.

author: Dag Wieers
comment: App was in French as if Belgium is French-speaking. What a turn-down.

reply.author: myShopi
reply.content: Hello Dag, you have the possibility to choose between French and Dutch at the launch of the app. Have a great day, myShopi Team

author: kulbir singh
comment: Very good  deals

reply.author: myShopi
reply.content: Hello Kulbir, thanks for your feedback ! The myShopi team.

author: A Google User
comment: Rate this app as 5 stars back in 2012. I have been using it for over 5 years. It was a great app. I loved the function that allows adding/hiding category and adding new item with picture. Now, you have to download another app for “International Region”. The original app is only available for “Belgium Region”. It does not support English and you still have to reset everything. I'm so regretted that I updated to the latest version. If I have to reset everything, why do I have to stick with this app?

author: Ron Paulsen
comment: Your app now stinks. It used to be the best on the market I have redone 3 times to where I have everything I need to buy. Then you change everything and don't support United States anymore. I cannot get on your International so I guess I'll check back every year to see if you fixed it thanks for a once-great app not So Much Anymore

reply.author: myShopi
reply.content: Hello, sorry for the inconvenience, it seems that something went wrong with the language of your app and the migration. A brand new app for international users is available on the Play Store (exactly the same as before). I recommend to desinstall your app and download it again from the store. Thanks for your feedback, myShopi team.

author: Juli W
comment: 4 years using this app and now everything I had added and categorized has once again been removed. This used to be my favorite shopping list app but this is the second complete wipe-out of information. And the permissions required to download this app are unreasonable. It would take me weeks to try to add back everything that was deleted. Very disappointing.

author: Tom Steynen
comment: Too much clutter and adds. I have to scroll and click too many times before I finally get to my shopping list. I've used this app for over a year now but am now going to look for an alternative.

author: Thomas Gommes
comment: Synchronization is the only feature I find interesting in this app... But it just doesn't work. I reinstall it from time to time but no improvement.

reply.author: myShopi
reply.content: Hello Thomas, sorry for the inconvenience, we are aware of some issues with synchronization and we plan to fix this soon. Thanks for your feedback, myShopi team.

author: Paulina's kitchen
comment: Good for me

reply.author: myShopi
reply.content: Thanks ! Have a good day, the myShopi team.

author: John Henderson
comment: Update: 15/03/2017 -  for all those having problems with the backup/restore. MyShopi restore didn't work for me either. I used Helium backup on old phone, then restored on new phone. Helium restored all MyShopi settings, added products and all item pictures. Be patient as it can take a while for the database to fully complete its work. I love MyShopi and had to find a way to restore. I hope this helps others out there.

reply.author: myShopi
reply.content: Hello John and thanks for your advice. We are working to improve the migration and backup restore/process but some people still having troubles with this. We will continue to fix this process and we hope it will be more stable soon. Have a good day, myShopi team.

author: Terry Gruber
comment: They stopped service in English language. I live in the USA.  Useless now, but it was good.  EDIT: 7/11/17.  Problem is fixed, works great.  Edit: 9-20-17.  They screwed it up again, wiped out my data and gives only a Belgian version.

reply.author: myShopi
reply.content: (21/09) Hello, sorry for the inconvenience, it seems that something went wrong with the language of your app and the migration. A brand new app for international users is available on the Play Store (exactly the same as before). I recommend to desinstall your app and download it again from the store. Thanks for your feedback, myShopi team.

author: Tony Ilegems
comment: Can not get passed initial screen. Tried to install Belgium Dutch at least 5 times and the app always returns to the US flag, asking me what country I want. When I select België a popup tells me it will install but it never does.

author: mary beaudette
comment: Been using this grocery shopping list for every years it's so easy to use and add your own items as needed when you scan bar code and add pictures through Google search .I give it 5 stars and more .

reply.author: myShopi
reply.content: Hello Mary and thanks for your feedback ! Have a great day, the myShopi Team

author: Alfredo L. Munet
comment: Easy to use, easy to add items, item pictures very familiar, great way to keeping track of missing items from your pantry!

reply.author: myShopi
reply.content: Hello Alfredo, thanks for your feedback ! Have a great day, myShopi team.

author: Michele F
comment: Updated: Now that images are back, this is again a great shopping app. I would still see some improvements, but it's the best shopping app I've tried.

reply.author: myShopi
reply.content:
Custom picture/images option is back for the shopping list!
It took us some time, but we solved the issue with the broken link to Google images.
We replaced it with Bing Image search, and your experience should be seamless again.
Thanks for your patience, and if you are happy with this fix, we look forward to get our stars back.

author: manu braff
comment: Tried to install it through Belgian (french or dutch) but doesn't get passed the language selection

reply.author: myShopi
reply.content: Hello Manu, we are aware that the app can crash at launch with Android O. We are currently releasing a version to fix this issue (version 7.1.2). Sorry for this inconvenience, myShopi team.

author: Toon Vermeulen
comment: Love it

author: Daniel Gilbert
comment: From USA. Uninstalled / Reinstalled and English is back. Needed to restore from SD card but no downloaded pics saved. Need to re-download them all. Could have been better; could have been worse. Downloaded pics stored in DB would be helpful when transferring DB between devices.

reply.author: myShopi
reply.content: Hi, can you try to download the new myShopi version 6.4.5? It should solve this issue. Hope this works out for you. Apologies for the inconvenience and looking forward to get our stars back.

author: Nanna Dee
comment: Loved this app...so much i recommended it to freinds and family.  Now after updating it has turned into a nightmare. Living in the uk..i now find only belgium is offered. SO DISSAPOINTED..... UPDATE...Thanks so much to the makers for contacting me..i have since reinstalled the app....so far so good! fingers crossed it stays that way. Thank you all.

reply.author: myShopi
reply.content: Hi, can you try to download the new myShopi version 6.4.5? It should solve this issue. Hope this works out for you. Apologies for the inconvenience and looking forward to get our stars back.

author: A C
comment: Loved this app for years until now: Belgium only, French only. Going to uninstall it. ----------------- Your answer doesn't resolve the issue: I had the list of my favourite items, including items I had added/customised myself for years. You completely reset our choices and expect people to download another app and do all the set up from scratch.  It's an extremely poor marketing move and clearly no one is happy about it.  You should at least admit it and apologise.

reply.author: myShopi
reply.content: Update : The automatic migration that we develop for this case can't support the custom shopping lists / items. But as a work around, you can try to use the backup and restore tool in the settings of the app. It allow you to save your data before the migration and then restore it. Sorry for the inconvenience, the myShopi Team.

author: Jodee Harding
comment: I loved this app and would have given it 5 stars untill today! Now it is useless! It is no longer supported in English. I have recommended this app to all my friends and now none of us can use it here in the USA unless you speak Belgian. Very disappointed.  I'm an so glad!!! My shopping is fix it's back in English again!!!!! Changed rating from 1 star to 5 stars. Thanks for fixing it.

author: Ray C
comment: June 27. The developer asked me to update to recent Version 6.4.5 This is the MyShopi I loved. It looks like the version that was Belgian only has been withdrawn from the Store for the English speakers. I withheld one star because of the mess that Belgian only update caused.  June 19. After spending two days reinstalling pictures for all my custom entries, it reset itself back to Belgian language again. I wish I could just use previous version, or I would love a paid version that I can depend on.  2017 June 14. Update not in English! I uninstalled, and reinstalled. Now in English again. Can import previous backup from SD card, if you have a backup. 2016 July 26 Latest update changes layout - too much white space for phone use.      2016 April 07. I just saw an update available, and the picture search is back!

reply.author: myShopi
reply.content: Hi, can you try to download the new myShopi version 6.4.5? It should solve this issue. Hope this works out for you. Apologies for the inconvenience and looking forward to get our stars back.

author: A Google User
comment: Love this app and have used it for years? Now, I just wish there was a "Grand total" option to see how much all my list total together.

author: Sonia Konza
comment: This app is simply the best shopping list app.

author: Maxim Solomaniuck
comment: To much work to build a list

author: A Google User
comment: I only gave back 2 stars because when I reinstalled the app and restored the database, I still have to rechoose all the pictures affiliated with my items.  Also, for some reason, everytime I try to select a picture for the Auto category from my Gallery, the app shuts down.

reply.author: myShopi
reply.content:
Custom picture/images option is back for the shopping list!
It took us some time, but we solved the issue with the broken link to Google images.
We replaced it with Bing Image search, and your experience should be seamless again.
Thanks for your patience, and if you are happy with this fix, we look forward to get our stars back

author: André Overputte
comment: Since last update, my shopi doesn't work anymore. Pls fix it.

author: Paul Hildebrandt
comment: Yay English back

author: Pauline Curwen
comment: Would have given 5 stars if it wasnt for the recent update, Was a fantastic app and I used it daily but now since the recent update on 19/06/2017 the app now doesn't support the UK / english language, only Belgium so is completely useless, can you please sort it out and do another update, many thanks

reply.author: myShopi
reply.content: Hi, can you try to download the new myShopi version 6.4.5? It should solve this issue. Hope this works out for you. Apologies for the inconvenience and looking forward to get our stars back.

author: Lucy Brain
comment: Lost all of my photos, favourites etc and only available for Belgium......

reply.author: myShopi
reply.content: Hi, can you try to download the new myShopi version 6.4.5? It should solve this issue. Hope this works out for you. Apologies for the inconvenience and looking forward to get our stars back.

comment: Really liked this app until it just got updated. Now not in english. No good to me now.

reply.author: myShopi
reply.content: Hi, can you try to download the new myShopi version 6.4.5? It should solve this issue. Hope this works out for you. Apologies for the inconvenience and looking forward to get our stars back.

author: Matt Todd
comment: Really liked this app untill recent update pushed pop up ads and removed language support for English.

reply.author: myShopi
reply.content: Hi, can you try to download the new myShopi version 6.4.5? It should solve this issue. Hope this works out for you. Apologies for the inconvenience and looking forward to get our stars back.

author: Jon Allsey
comment: Was gr8 now English dropped & unusable due to ads

reply.author: myShopi
reply.content: Hi, can you try to download the new myShopi version 6.4.5? It should solve this issue. Hope this works out for you. Apologies for the inconvenience and looking forward to get our stars back.

author: Sara Santiano
comment: The only reason why I'm giving 4 stars is because the price feature that's supposed to display the total doesn't work. Other than that, this app is brilliant.

author: Tracy X
comment: Used to love this app but then adding google images didn't work. The promised update just removed option altogether. Looking for an alternative :(

author: Adam Duran
comment: Works as it should, a good app. Would love to see the calculator make a comeback, that was really helpful.

author: becky zaloudek
comment: Liked it better prior to the last update. Now you have to go through another step just to add an item. May look for another app

author: Koen Devos
comment: I don't want to receive push notifications, but there 's no option to deactivate them / App regularly logs me out, and getting my shopping lists back when logging in isn't as smooth as it should be. Sync fails as only a couple of items on the list are restored at first. Need to log out/in a couple of times to get everything back, very annoying.

This probably one of my most used and favorite apps. My only complaint is the inability to organize the "items" and Categories"  database  alphabetically. This would certainly make it easier to compile my shopping list every week

author: A Google User
comment: Great but there's not much point of a bar code reader of it can't recognise any bar codes. Also, very few features work in the UK
